title: EVALUATION TIME——进化时间
author: 查理九世帅
txt_content:
本帖最后由 查理九世帅 于 2020-6-20 01:30 编辑 

地图信息
用这张独特设计的地图来测试你的技能，它提供了超过18个关卡，包括跑酷、解密等等。收集70多颗分散在测试中的绿宝石，赢取15颗钻石！
游戏说明
当载入游戏开始时按下你面前的按钮。通过进入聊天并点击不同的答案中的一个来回应“监管者”。（原文：Answer to the Overseer by entering the chat and clicking on one of the different answers.）使用大厅中的按钮开始测试。测试太难了？使用物品栏中的“重置”物品返回到大厅。
游戏规则
只能进入一个玩家，这是一张单人地图。
不要作弊，默认的游戏模式应该是/gamemode adventure（冒险模式）。
游戏目标
总共有18个测试，将测试你的跑酷、解密、射箭的准确性和用鞘翅的滑翔能力(感谢新推出的方块——蜂蜜块！)。
收集总共72颗绿宝石和18颗钻石，才能100%完成地图。总共有4颗绿宝石分散在每次测试之中，每次测试完成后会奖励一颗钻石。

附加信息
这张地图使用了1.15.2的机关，包括蜂蜜跑酷。
挑战可能需要1到3个小时，这取决于您跑酷和解密的技巧。
你会注意到有一些对话要求您——玩家——选择一个答案。这是通过简单地打开聊天并点击你的答案来完成的。请注意:如果你重新进入游戏并且聊天被清除，使用你的物品再次显示你的选项。

原文：MAP INFO 
Test your skill with this uniquely designed map which offers over 18 levels that include parkour, puzzles and much more. Collect over 70 emeralds scattered throughout the tests and earn over 15 diamonds! 
 INSTRUCTIONS 
Press the button in front of you when loading the game to begin. Answer to the Overseer by entering the chat and clicking on one of the different answers. Begin a test by using the buttons in the hub. Test too difficult? Use your "Reset" item in your hotbar to return to the hub. 
RULES 
One player only, this is a single player map. Do not cheat, the default gamemode should be /gamemode adventure. 
THE OBJECTIVE
 There are 18 total tests which will test your parkour, puzzle, bow accuracy, and sliding capabilities (thanks to the newly introduced block, honey!). Collect a total of 72 Emeralds and 18 Diamonds to 100% complete the map. Each test contains a total of 4 Emeralds spread throughout it, with a Diamond being rewarded upon the completion of the test. 
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 
This map uses 1.15.2 mechanics which includes Honey Parkour.  The challenge may take anywhere between 1 and 3 hours depending on your experience with parkour courses and puzzles.  You will notice there are a few dialogues which require you, the player, to choose an answer. This is done by simply opening the chat and clicking on your answer. PLEASE NOTE: If you restarted the game and the chat cleared, use your item to display your options again.
下载地址：链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1kW7BPKkftz9NXyF2KlpOdg 提取码：p61t
